d0

; Some sample data
d$e0000401
d$e0010402
d$e0020403
d$e0040404
d$e0050405

d$00000401
d$00010412
d$00020423
d$000304c0
d$000404ff
d$00050473

; Test each sample data 8K bank
d$00010401
d$20020402
d$40030403
d$40200401
d$40210402
d$40220403
d$40240404
d$60040404
d$80040405
d$a0040406
d$c0040407
d$e0000401
d$e0010402
d$e0020403
d$e0040404
d$e0050405

d0

; Audio registers
; Loop and active = 0
d$802c0100
d$802d0100

; Voice 0
; Volume
d$800001ff
; Address
d$80010102
d$80020100
; Length
d$80030104
d$80040100
; Rate
d$80050100
d$80060110
; Loop address
d$80070120
d$80080140
; Loop length
d$80090103
d$800a0100

; Turn on looping and voice 0
d$802c0101
d$802d0101

d0
